title: Create an Item
text: Click on the blue + in the lower right corner and select Add item.

title: Create a Page
text: Click on the blue + in the lower right corner and select the type of page you want to create.

title: Create a Rule
text: Click on the blue + in the lower right corner.

title: Delete an Item
text: Select the item from the list to go to the details page. Click on the Remove Item button at the bottom of the page.

title: Delete multiple Items
text: Click on Select in the upper-right corner (or ctrl + click on an Item). Select all Items to be deleted using the checkboxes and then click on the Remove button at the bottom of the screen.

title: Find available icons
text: OpenHAB specific icons can be found at the docs page linked below. F7 icons are listed in the F7 docs.
